dct_title_s: Erster Abrissz der Stadt Jerŭsalem wie sie füernemlich zur Zeit desz Herrn Christi beschaffen gewesen
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, roads and paths, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of structures, people, and biblical scenes.
Sites of interest are numbered (but there is no key present).
From Biblia ... Durch Martin Luther. Nuernberg : 1736.
